<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_hotel.MyDomainInfo</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>MyDomainInfo
this needs be saved in global</description><name>MyDomainInfo</name><script><![CDATA[var MyDomainInfo = Class.create();


DomainInfo.prototype = {


       initialize: function() {


       },



       getCurrentDomain : function() {


               var throwAwayRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");


               throwAwayRecord.newRecord();



               return throwAwayRecord.getValue("sys_domain");



       },

       getThisUser : function(ThisUser) {


               var thisUser = gs.getUser();


               thisUser = gs.getUser().getUserByID(ThisUser);



               return thisUser;



       },


       type: 'DomainInfo'


};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-25 13:04:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>85046ecbdbd818900d7cfe1b6896190f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MyDomainInfo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Hotel" source="x_hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="My Hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_85046ecbdbd818900d7cfe1b6896190f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-25 13:04:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
